title: Events upon outgoing/incoming call started and ended
body: I would be extremely useful in a variety of app types to be notified upon call started and ended events, at least be able to check whether or not the device is being used for a phonecall.

comments.body: I am also panning to create app related to get incoming caller number. I think its better to have API to get such information on incoming call event.
I am also planning to developing an app related to call. But there is no api to get the notification when incoming and outgoing calls started. please consider this useful feature request.
